commit message: Italian Translation Updated

Merge pull request #77 from Eco80/master

Italian Translation Updated
Spanish translations

Change youtube addon url to newest one
Fix issues with sharing youtube videos to Kodi:
1. Queue all videos, including the first,
2. Fix youtube url parsing
3. Handle intent in onStart instead of onCreate
Initial Russian translations were added

Merge pull request #79 from dmitryash/master

Initial Russian translations were added
Workaround for issue #78: https://github.com/xbmc/Kore/issues/78

Catch an exception that is being reported in Google Play, when user enters a malformed URL as the media center address. This causes a RuntimeException on OkHttp which wasn't being handled. Ideally we should validate the hostname/ip address that the user enters, but i'm not sure that Patterns.IP_ADDRESS/Patterns.DOMAIN_NAME/Patterns.WEB_URL catches all the possible cases, so i opted for the lazy solution, catch the exception

Change behaviour when receiving a youtube URI request: if no video is playing, clear the video playlist fist, queue the requested URI to the (empty) playlist, and start playback. If a video is playing, just queue the file to the video playlist. The playlist wasn't being cleared previously, which was causing some strange behaviour.
add chinese(simpled chinese)

Merge pull request #86 from tomaswcz/patch-1

Please add the czech language
Added Basque translation

Fix calculation of packet number and sizes, that was causing packets with payloads of size 0 not to be sent, as well as packets with payloads of sizes multiple of MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE to send empty packets.
Add constants for the different types of button maps

D-Pad on the remote screen now uses EventServer by default.
Not finished: EventServer port is still hardcoded (9777) and there's no possibility of configuration.

Change D-Pad buttons behaviour, so that they don't fire a command on each touch event. The other scheme makes them too sensitive, which causes them to issue commands when the user swipes on the remote screen for instance.
Add EventServer configuration options in wizard and host editing.

Merge pull request #100 from akshay2000/master

Added Vibration on Remote Arrow Press
Change vibration duration to 50ms
Tweak cast list margins
Add support to see all cast on now playing screen

Simplify AllCastActivity: the cast list is always passed by the calling activity/fragment (via Intent), so this activity looses the ability to fetch the list from the database.
Change calling activities to reflect that.
Fix AllCastActivity drawer indicator and highlight on drawer
Centralize all cast activity intent building
Change the 'see all cast' button to be the last image on the cast grid view
Fix row count and max pictures count on cast grid view
Fix runtime warning concerning app:theme
Fix changing play/pause icons on remote, with different themes

Fix fragment transactions on host wizard: previous fragments weren't being properly removed with the call to replace() on the FragmentTransaction, because the container used was the global one. Somehow this stopped working with recent versions
Update pt strings
Bump version for release
